Vector3D

public Vector3D(double x,
                double y,
                double z)
Creates a 3D point from its coordinates. It is a greyscaled point.

Parameters:
x - coordinate along X axis
y - coordinate along Y axis
z - coordinate along Z axis

getSkewSymmetric

public double[][] getSkewSymmetric()
SkewSymmetric matrix. This method builds the SkewSymmetric matrix described on pages 119-120 of Geometric Tools for Computer Graphics (Schneider03) This matrix is used to compute the cross product as a matrix-vector multiplication

Returns:

this method computes the rotational matrix for performing general rotations around this vector

Returns:

normalize

public double normalize()
Perform normalization over vector. After this operation, vector module is 1.

Returns:
old vector module on successful. 0 othercase.
